pages.text: $(#551012)Ensure your volume is on and loud enough. $(#FFFF55)Audio is crucial$(#551012) for gameplay and knowing where enemies are. Headphones are highly recommended.$(br2)Certain important items are $(#FFFF55)pre-bookmarked in JEI$(#551012), visible on the left side of your inventory. You can bookmark items yourself by pressing $(#104455)A$(#551012).$()

$(#551012)Many items are meant to be used by pressing $(#104455)right-click$(#551012) with it in your hand. However, if you have a weapon/tool in your $(#FFFF55)off-hand$(#551012), you must $(#104455)shift + right-click$(#551012) to use it.$(br2)$(#FFFF55)Checkpoints occur$(#551012) before every major boss battle and after entering a new dimension. Your spawn point is set when you see this message: $(br)$(#104455)Your soul has been bound to this position.$(#551012)$(br)------------------------------------>
$(#551012)You can move while in your inventory and most GUIs!$()
